title: In Their Likeness
description: Three bodies found in Central London. All arranged in bizarre poses. The Metropolitan Police at a loss.The senior investigating officer asks his former superior, retired DCI Amber Fearns, for help.Amber refuses, wants nothing to do anymore with violence and murder. But one glance at the crime scene photos and she's drawn in against her will... because she sees something none of the investigators could see.As soon as she starts working the case, her instinct tells her the killer will strike again. It's just a matter of when.Can Amber help stop him before he kills again?In Their Likeness is the first book in the Amber Fearns London thriller series by Denise Yoko Berndt, combining psychological suspense with police procedural. All novels in this series can be read as a standalone.
author: Denise Yoko Berndt
